devdoc.details: Swap through liquidator is still allowed to be able to get required profitToCover, but this amount is small

params.addition0: Additional amount A0 of {asset0}.                  Balance0 = A0 + B0                  We need following balances in results: B0 : Balance1 === {proportion}:{100_000-proportion}
params.prop0: Proportion of {asset0}, > 0. Proportion of {asset1} is calculates as 1e18 - prop0
params.threshold0: Min allowed amount of {asset0}-collateral, 0 - use default min value
params.threshold1: Min allowed amount of {asset1}-collateral, 0 - use default min value

rebalanceAssets(ITetuConverter,ITetuLiqu.notice: Set balances of {asset0} and {asset1} in proportions {prop0}:{prop1} using borrow/repay (no swaps)

userdoc.notice: Library to make new borrow, extend/reduce exist borrows and repay to keep proper assets proportions
